snippet: The big beef producer said it listened to customers and consumers and decided to identify the binder, known as finely textured beef or as pink slime.
abstract: Big beef producer Cargill, in wake of public outcry, announces it will begin labeling packages of ground beef containing finely textured meat, or what is colloquially known as pink slime.
lead_paragraph: The big beef producer said it listened to customers and consumers and decided to identify the binder, known as finely textured beef or as pink slime.

headline.main: After Public Outcry, Cargill Says It Will Label Products Made With a Beef Binder
headline.print_headline: After Public Outcry, Cargill Says It Will Label Products Made With a Beef Binder
